subject: Baseball
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Cashman grew up in Lexington, Ky., wanting to play basketball for the Wildcats, and he has noted the title-year symmetry between that team and the Yankees, for whom he is now the general manager.
snippet: Cashman grew up in Lexington, Ky., wanting to play basketball for the Wildcats, and he has noted the title-year symmetry between that team and the Yankees, for whom he is now the general manager.
